com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps

Class Style

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.Style

  • public class Style
extends Object
    The proxy object for current map style.

    To create new instances of this object, create a new instance using a Style.Builder and load the style with MapboxMap#setStyle(Builder). This object is returned from MapboxMap.getStyle() once the style has been loaded by underlying map.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Style.Builder
      Builder for composing a style object.
      static interface  Style.OnStyleLoaded
      Callback to be invoked when a style has finished loading.
      static interface  Style.StyleUrl
      Indicates the parameter accepts one of the values from Style.

    • Field Detail

      • MAPBOX_STREETS

        public static final String MAPBOX_STREETS
        Mapbox Streets: A complete basemap, perfect for incorporating your own data. Using this constant means your map style will always use the latest version and may change as we improve the style.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OUTDOORS

        public static final String OUTDOORS
        Outdoors: A general-purpose style tailored to outdoor activities. Using this constant means your map style will always use the latest version and may change as we improve the style.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String SATELLITE_STREETS

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRAFFIC_DAY

        public static final String TRAFFIC_DAY
        Traffic Day: Color-coded roads based on live traffic congestion data. Traffic data is currently available in these select countries. Using this constant means your map style will always use the latest version and may change as we improve the style.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRAFFIC_NIGHT

        public static final String TRAFFIC_NIGHT
        Traffic Night: Color-coded roads based on live traffic congestion data, designed to maximize legibility in low-light situations. Traffic data is currently available in these select countries. Using this constant means your map style will always use the latest version and may change as we improve the style.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Returns:

        public <T extends Source> T getSourceAs(String sourceId)
        Tries to cast the Source to T, throws ClassCastException if it's another type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type of a Source
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the id used to look up a layer
        Returns:
        the casted Source, null if another type

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        index - the index to insert the layer at

      • removeLayer

        public boolean removeLayer(String layerId)
        Removes the layer. Any references to the layer become invalid and should not be used anymore
        Parameters:
        layerId - the layer to remove
        Returns:
        the removed layer or null if not found

      • removeLayer

        public boolean removeLayer(Layer layer)
        Removes the layer. The reference is re-usable after this and can be re-added
        Parameters:
        layer - the layer to remove
        Returns:
        the layer

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • setTransition

        public void setTransition(TransitionOptions transitionOptions)

        Set the transition duration for style changes.

        The default value for delay and duration is zero, so any changes take effect without animation.
        Parameters:
        transitionOptions - the transition options

      • getTransition

        public TransitionOptions getTransition()

        Get the transition for style changes.

        The default value for delay and transition is zero, so any changes take effect without animation.
        Returns:
        TransitionOptions the transition options

      • getLight

        public Light getLight()
        Get the light source used to change lighting conditions on extruded fill layers.
        Returns:
        the global light source

      • isFullyLoaded

        public boolean isFullyLoaded()
        Returns true if the style is fully loaded. Returns false if style hasn't been fully loaded or a new style is underway of being loaded.
        Returns:
        True if fully loaded, false otherwise
